role_description: An Ansible role that installs Ultimate Plumber (a tool for writing Linux pipes with instant live preview) on Linux or macOS
role_description_full_overview: up, which is short for [Ultimate Plumber](https://github.com/akavel/up), is a tool for writing Linux pipes in a terminal-based UI interactively, with an instant live preview of command results.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Ultimate Plumber (a tool for writing Linux pipes with instant live preview) on Linux or macOS.
